Pre-Game Insights: Andre Russell requested a period of rest and recovery as well as Jason Holder who played five back-to-back five Tests against England and South Africa.
South Africa lost to India in the T20 World Cup final.
Andre Russell backed KKR head coach Chandrakant Pandit after an ex-player's criticism.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Andre Russell will miss West Indies' three-match T20 International series against South Africa starting on August 23.
Shimron Hetmyer and Fabian Allen return to the squad.
Roston Chase has been named deputy to Rovman Powell.
South Africa is also without some big names including Quinton de Kock, Kagiso Rabada, Keshav Maharaj, Tabraiz Shamsi, and David Miller.
Others: The series will be part of double-headers with the Women's Caribbean Premier League, which kicks off on August 21.
All three T20Is will be played at the Brian Lara Stadium in Tarouba, Trinidad.
Both South Africa's tour of West Indies 2024 and the Women's Caribbean Premier League 2024 will be streamed live on FanCode.
